name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-ui-templates-ts
title: Teams UI templates
shortDescription: This sample app can help you better understand how apps should look and behave in Microsoft Teams. The app includes examples of tested, high-quality UI templates that work across common Teams use cases (such as dashboards or forms)
longDescription: This sample app can help you better understand how apps should look and behave in Microsoft Teams. The app includes examples of tested, high-quality UI templates that work across common Teams use cases (such as dashboards or forms)

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
